Name: Soulscape
About the game: Explore the Dangerous and Bizarre World of Dragonar. Fight Epic battles against Bizarre and Eldritch monstrosities. Upgrade and build your character in whatever way you like! Tame magical dragons to summon in battle! Fight Dozens of unique and powerful bosses. Ride around on your sick wheelchair. Look at sentient Ass-cheeks in a club. Experience the First Chapter in an epic trilogy! Soulscape is a strange world, waiting to be conquered! Will you rise to the challenge?
Meta Title: Soulscape: Jul 26, 2019, Samu and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Soulscape? Check out the release date (Jul 26, 2019), developer insights from Samu, and a complete game summary.
